title: No Longer Being Able to Duo with Mates
body: So here's the story, my friend and i were duoing, when he hit Gold 5. At first we were happy for him to rank up to get the rewards and all that, but then we realised we could no longer play together, with me being Bronze 3 and all. Is there anything we can do to duo again?

replies.body: Well it's really simple, you git gud and leave bronze.
